primevc.core.dispatcher.Signals

type
class
implements
haxe.Public
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
IUnbindable<Dynamic>
subclasses
primevc.core.events.CommunicationSignals, primevc.core.events.LoaderSignals, primevc.gui.events.DisplaySignals, primevc.gui.events.DragEvents, primevc.gui.events.DropTargetEvents, primevc.gui.events.EditSignals, primevc.gui.events.KeyboardSignals, primevc.gui.events.MouseSignals, primevc.gui.events.TextSignals, primevc.gui.events.UserSignals, primevc.mvc.events.MVCEvents
A group of Signal instances and (when applicable) other signal groups. Signals allows to pool Signal instances in one place. It implements the haxe.Public interface to make signals public by default.

Usage example of a group with 1 Signal and another signal group

class LoaderSignals extends Signals { var unloaded (default, null) : Signal0; var load (default, null) : CommunicationEvents; }

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

Uses reflection to find all IDisposable properties of this class and calls dispose() on them.

unbind(listener : Dynamic, ?handler : Dynamic) : Int

returns
number of handlers that were unbound.
see
Signal.unbind
Uses reflection to find all IUbindable properties of this class and forwards the arguments to them.
